titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for prevention of the adiournment of the courts of iustice, without consent of both Houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop in the Old Baylie,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Die Martis 30. April. 1644. Io. Browne Cler. Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Old Baylie
